Text: a million thankyou's for putting this up,!!!!!!!!!! the wife loves her soaps and I haven't been able to find them lately. will you be putting it up everyday? I hope so. thanks again
Yes, I hope to be able to continue putting all the soaps up every day.

thanks so much i have gotten all 3 you put up and they work great. cant wait to see the next ones. your great to do this and my wife is thrilled to see them again. made her day and saw a smile dont see many she is going through cancer treatments. so i cant say thank you enough for doing these soaps. your wonderful!!!!!!!
Thanks, I am glad th hear they worked. I have never uploaded any torrents until this week and I wasn't sure if I was doing it correct, so I am glad to hear some positive feedback.

your doing great at them, had no problems getting them except for this one.if you could just seed this one please I am stuck at 75% and have been since last night. all the others yesterday i got no problem just this one. can you seed it please. once people get it full than others will be able to help you seed them.
